archdesc.runner: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University

did.head: Descriptive Summary
did.repository: Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.
did.abstract: The Catharine Flood McCall Legal Document includes a court order from Henrico County, VA. The document orders for the seizure of the goods of Robert S. Smithey as payment for previously incurred debts.

userestrict.head: Use Restrictions
userestrict.p: Permission to publish material from Catharine Flood McCall Legal Document must be obtained from Special Collections, Virginia Tech.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: Researchers wishing to cite this collection should include the following information: Catharine Flood McCall Legal Document, Ms2011-095, Special Collections, Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University, Blacksburg, Va.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Special Collections purchased the Catharine Flood McCall Legal Document in October 2011.

processinfo.head: Processing Information
processinfo.p: The processing, arrangement, and description of the Catharine Flood McCall Legal Document was completed in October 2011.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of a single legal document filed with Henrico County, Virginia, in 1810. The document calls for seizure Robert S. Smithey's "goods and chattles" as payment of a debt to Catharine Flood McCall. Court clerk Izard B. Whitlocke served as the witness for the ruling.

arrangement.head: Arrangement
arrangement.p: The collection is arranged by material type.
